definition: It's too late to plug the leak once ship is in the middle of the river. (idiom)
pinyin: chuan2 dao4 jiang1 xin1 , bu3 lou4 chi2

definition: to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)
